content.question: What was the initial speed of the ball?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3, and denominator the square root of 2, end fraction, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mstyle><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="three halves meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3, and denominator the square root of 2, end fraction, meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mstyle><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
